content_descriptors.notes: This is a combat-heavy game, so naturally there's violence. Blood can be disabled through settings.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-1115G4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-1115G4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
